name: Adventures of Yogi Bear
description: When Yogi Bear catches wind of a plan to turn Jellystone Park into a Chemical plant he sets out on a mission to stop it. Play as Yogi in this side-scrolling Action/Adventure that is fit for all ages. Work your way through the five park areas collecting "Pic-i-nic" baskets by bouncing on top of them. In many cases you bounce from one basket to the next raising you into the air where no "average bear" could ever go. There are a variety of enemies such as weasels and skunks. There are also some action parts where you ride a mine cart or go "beaver surfing".

shot.caption: Title screen.
Map screen.
Yogi is about to cross a bridge and collect some clocks!
After some time walking, Yogi finds a duo-rabbit trouble...
To escape from the danger, Yogi jumps above a row of weasels.
Jump above floating platforms (clouds etc.) to reach top-high places!
The best-good alternative to escape from a pestering bat: crouching!
Yogi jumps to collect some baskets: a purple-skinned skunk is in your way...
Yogi tries to jump above another row of weasels, but this time he's damaged!
After some time in a mine cart, Yogi finds a cake piece, but he must avoid some dangers first...
While Yogi collects some clocks, two top-falling stones are about to pester his way!
Instead to cross the other side by the platform, Yogi chooses the Picnic-baskets-based route...
Before to cross the other side, Yogi must avoid to be bitten by some raging fishes...
After some more time of walk-exploring, Yogi arrives to a place surrounded by some ghosts...
Instead of crossing an incomplete wooden bridge, Yogi Bear uses some Picnic baskets... as shortcut!
Thanks to a not-well-planned jump, Yogi Bear is about to be hit-damaged by a bird... too bad!
A ghost is above Yogi: could him be sufficiently quick-fast to escape of this flying menace?
With a jump of faith, Yogi was be able to stomp a ghost, but he'll be able to stomp the next one?
After some long-time swimming, Yogi could hit-stomps a turtle: and after it, she's about to escape!
Now, Yogi finds a section where two menacing oil drums are floating usually: avoid it at all costs!
And Yogi Bear swims a lot more: suddenly, he finds a  huge-bit-raging fish... that hit-damages him!
Yogi is about to add more clocks to his counter: to this, he utilizes some animal-surfing methods...
Surrounded by a lot of Picnic baskets and a simple cake piece, Yogi Bear starts the item catchin'!
After the single row of big-little turtles having ran out, Yogi Bear can to swim to the surface...
Before to add-collect some more clocks, Yogi walks slowly to pass below an iron-hit-stomping gadget!
Yogi Bear doesn't still know, but he's about to be hit-damaged by a "living"-crazy-jackhammer!
The next obstacle to be avoided by Yogi is a machine that "shoots" some rolling-dangerous barrels.
The weasels returned to pestering Yogi Bear! And one of them have "killed" him: 2 lives will left...
After having reached a section protected by a worker and a duo-rabbit team, Yogi plans a strategy...
If Yogi Bear wants cross-jump to the opposite side, he must walk now above a moving conveyor belt...
